title: Finding Wawt Relatives
description: In FINDING WAWT RELATIVES, WAWT, the main character, is on a mission to find its relatives. This journey takes WAWT to Alaska where WAWT meets its relative, Wal-WAWT. WAWT learns of sadness, loneliness, comfort, and anticipation. This is the fourth book of the WAWT series. Children are able to draw their own pictures and add their own story ideas to the book.
author: M.H. Ackerman
